content.rendered:
In our most recent return to InterContinental Danang, The Planners had the honor of making a memorable garden wedding for Lan & Long along with their dearest ones.

The couple wanted to deliver a unique experience for their guests, thence our extra amount of time and effort spent on this factor during the planning process.

A special seating chart to set the mood, familiar games, polaroid station, specially designed hand fan for each guest and a personalized greeting on the welcome board,… These little details were put together to bring an enjoyable wedding experience to everyone attending.

Inspired by English gardens, we created a romantic concept for the bride and groom with blue as the primary tone. The extraordinary view from La Maison restaurant overlooking the mountains and sea gave the outdoor ceremony a magnificent background.

For the dinner reception, InterContinental Danang’s White Hall always offer a fantastic ambience, suitable for both emotional and upbeat functions.

The vibe of the wedding was immaculate with the exciting performances by the groom and his groomsmen. Firstly, Long’s solo dance during the ceremony had hyped up everyone’s mood, then his rap song, produced and performed by himself, really fired up the whole dinner.

Watch the wonderful wedding film of Blue Garden
Take a look at this blog if you are finding an ideal resort for your beach wedding
